While the living space is clean and fully functional the outdoor space is what sets this home apart. There are both front and rear decks/patios with several "nooks" for casual seating around the beautifully landscaped property. You can enjoy an unobstructed view of the beach and beautiful sunsets from either the covered patio or the Adirondack chairs along the break-wall. There are two grills; one is charcoal and the other is propane (renters bring their own tank).
While the home is fantastic for hosting friends and family, this will absolutely not be a party house. This is our home. We expect people to enjoy their stay but treat the home and neighbors with the upmost respect. If you would like to discuss the specifics of this I would be happy to do so. Sorry, but no pets are permitted.
Feel free to email with any questions or to arrange a time to see the home. We are able to show the place most weekends.
Thank you for looking! All utilities included during weekly summer rentals. Utilities TBD for monthly rentals based on length of stay..If you are interested I'm seeking transitional housing for the next 90 days to 6 months, but certainly less than a year. I've had a very rough two years since COVID came in and wiped out everything that I had worked my entire life for. But that's in the past. I've been praying for housing so i can get back on track. You wouldn't believe how many times i've moved over the last two years across the Pacific Northwest, but we just landed here in San Diego.
Looking for a temporary housing agreement for an apartment in or around Point Loma or Loma Portal.
I'm a great businessman and handyman, and i'd be happy to help the landlord improve the unit in exchange for housing at a discounted rate. Ultimately, I'd love to buy a building and make it the premiere location for housing while leaning out operational costs.
I've got big ideas and has been at my side. Thank you for listening to my rant.
You and Keep You.

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

Upon entering unit 301, you're greeted by 10-foot ceilings and South-Facing Oversized Windows filling the living space with natural light. The kitchen features Stainless Steel Appliances, a built-in Microwave and Dishwasher, Granite Countertops, Modern Cabinetry, and an Island overlooking the living area. Hardwood Floors are throughout the living space and bedroom. The living room/dining room combo offers views of The historic Quaker Meeting House and plenty of room for entertaining. The Bathroom includes a Double Sink, a Tub/Shower combo, and Tiled floors. The in-unit Washer & Dryer are conveniently located in a dedicated closet. The 10-foot Ceilings and Oversized Windows continue in the spacious bedroom, which includes a Walk-In Closet and a modern shelving unit for additional storage. 315 Flats is situated in the heart of the neighborhood and steps from excellent restaurants, shops, Spruce Harbor Park, Independence Hall, Philadelphia's most historic sites, and all that Old City offers. Easy access to I-95, the Vine Street Expressway, and Ben Franklin Bridge. Schedule a private tour today! Garage parking options are located right around the corner.
315 Arch St #301

Amazing 2 bedroom 2 full bathroom home located on a quiet side street in Bella Vista! Enter into the living room with south-facing windows, exposed brick, and hardwood flooring throughout the home. title: Great value in Fairmount! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount
description:
Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. Inside the unit, you're greeted by a bright and open living room and dining area with soaring 9ft ceilings, tall windows, and beautiful hardwood floors. There's also a huge storage closet and a powder room. The home's kitchen is fitted with tons of cabinetry space, stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and the in-unit laundry closet. The home's second level has a spacious bedroom, with great closet space, at the front. A full bathroom and another bedroom, ideal for an office or nursery, complete this level. 1707 Wallace St's central Fairmount location is a walker's paradise, earning a WalkScore of 92. The Philadelphia Museum of Art, Kelly Drive, and The Community College of Philadelphia are all within walking distance. Nearby Fairmount Ave and North Broad Street are lined with local shops, gyms, and restaurants, including Bar Hygge, Rybread cafe, SOUTH, and Osteria. Whole Foods, Target, and Wine & Spirits are also close by. Plus, there's easy access to public transportation, I-76, Drexel University, and The University of Penn. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
1707 Wallace St #2R

title: This Spacious Bi-level Apartment Incredible Location!
description:
This spacious bi-level apartment checks all of the boxes... hardwood floors, central heat/AC, gas cooking, dishwasher, in-unit laundry, outdoor space, and an incredible location! In fact, this location has a Walk Score of 98, surrounded by some of the city's best coffee shops/brunch spots (Shot Tower Coffee, Fitzwater Cafe, etc) and neighborhood favorites new and old such as Fitz on 4th, Saloon Restaurant, & Little Fish. Inside the apartment you'll enjoy the top two floors (2nd/3rd) of the building, so no one living above you. The massive living room with exposed brick walls, 1/2 bathroom, laundry, and kitchen/dining area are all located on the 2nd floor. Off of the kitchen/dining room you can enjoy the first of two decks, convenient for grilling and outdoor dining. On the top floor there is a full bathroom and 3 spacious bedrooms, all with full closets. The rear bedroom also has a sliding door which leads out to your 2nd private deck. Property is vacant and can be scheduled on short notice!

title: Spacious, Contemporary 3 Bed/3 Bath Townhouse
description:
1410 S. Ringgold Street
Quiet block in Point Breeze, around the corner from Wharton Square Park, spacious, contemporary 3 bed/3 bath townhouse. Square footage estimated at 1764sf. + 286sf finished basement. Enter front door into bright, open design grand living room and dining space featuring spice white 5" hardwood floors throughout the home and designer recessed lighting. Kitchen is equipped with modern soft close, attractive Shaker gray cabinetry , white quartz counter tops, upgraded Samsung SS appliances, chef's faucet, dual sink, pendant lighting over center island, and under cabinet lighting. Look through window toward secluded, large brick garden with built in wood seating and envision barbecuing on a warm summers night. A fully finished basement provides an additional full bathroom, plus generous storage space and opportunity for a gym, a play area, or media room or guest space. Second level consists of 2 large bedrooms, with a multitude of tall windows reflecting brilliant sunlight, a laundry closet and a full bathroom. The third floor is dedicated to the master suite which is entered through a barn-style door that includes a spa- like luxurious bathroom, dual rain-fall shower and double vanity and last but not least, the fiberglass roof deck provides panoramic views of the city and a place to watch the lights twinkle at night. A short walk to lots of popular eating spots, Two Eagles cafe, On point Bistro and American Sardine Bar and all the development on Washington Avenue.
For more information and to schedule an appointment please call:

title: Recently Renovated 1 Bed w/ High Ceilings - Amazing Central Location
description:
Countermanagement.com/keppoch-house
Don't miss the opportunity to live in the beautifully renovated Keppoch House Apartments, situated on the historic tree-lined 13th Street corridor in Philadelphia. Bike lanes connect the Bella Vista and Washington Square neighborhoods and run parallel to the Avenue of the Arts for easy access throughout the city. You'll be within walking distance in every direction of Center City's best bars, restaurants, boutiques, culture, performance and visual arts venues. The amenities in the building include an elevator, free gym access, a shared roof deck, and limited garage parking availability.
Located in the heart of Washington Square West, you are encouraged to shop local! You 'll be within walking distance to Vetri Cucina, Mixto Restaurante, Sumo Sushi, Chapterhouse Cafe & Gallery, The Cambridge, Cheu Noodle Bar and more! You'll also have CVS, ACME Market, Whole Foods Market, and Unite Fitness all within a 1 mile radius.
Built in early 1900s and renovated in 2005, 2017, and 2019 the luxurious units offer modern industrial layouts in one of Philadelphia’s most historic neighborhoods. Situated on the tree-lined 13th Street corridor, residents enjoy open floor-plans in three unique styles, with elegant finishes and outdoor space, all within walking distance of the excitement and conveniences of downtown Philadelphia.
Keppoch House offers studio, 1 bedroom, and 2 bedroom apartments with state of the art keyless entry, covered private parking, NEST thermostats, energy-efficient appliances, onsite gym, new modern lobby, and rooftop deck with spectacular 360° views of the city. Enjoy modern living in one of Philadelphia’s classic historic districts.

Equally Appealing in Both Design and Function
Experience the charm and history of Washington Square West from the comforts of your own apartment in one of Philadelphia’s most sought-after neighborhoods. The Bradford apartment building was completed in July 2017 – offering high-end materials, premium appliances and fixtures, covered parking, enclosed dog run, and an outdoor tenant lounge with a community BBQ.

Contemporary living in one of Philadelphia’s classic historic districts.

title: Beautiful Furnished One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Best Deal in Fishtown/Norris Sq Beautiful Corner Unit
description:
Available NOW | Leasing Special: $1,325/month for a 18 month lease; or $1,375/month for a 12 month lease.
Beautiful corner unit! This 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment welcomes you into the main living space with exposed brick, large windows for sunlight, & exposed ductwork. The kitchen area is at the back and is fully equipped with white shaker cabinets, subway tile back splash, and sleek stainless steel appliances including a microwave, dishwasher, electric range, and refrigerator. Continue to your stunning bathroom boasting a modern gray vanity and gorgeous shower stall with detailed floor-to-ceiling tiling and a glass door. On the other side of the unit you will find your 2 bedrooms with spacious closets. The corner bedroom is a bit larger and receives a ton of natural light! Unit features hardwood floors, central air, washer / dryer, and recessed lighting throughout!
About The Neighborhood:
Located in Norris Square and walkable to tons of great shopping, eating, and entertainment options. You’ll be surrounded by public transportation bus routes for a quick commute throughout the city. Close proximity to Norris Square Park, Towey Playground, and La Placita Park. Just blocks from fantastic spots including Sunflower Philly, Human Robot, Cousins Supermarket, Luna Cafe, Original 13 Ciderworks, Halftime Goodtimes, Sidekicks Sports Bar & Grill, and countless more!
Lease Terms:
Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Strictly, no pets. Tenants responsible for: electricity, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.

title: Furnished 2 Bed 1 bath Sublet Near UCity
description:
Recently renovated historic property located off Lancaster Ave. and Haverford Ave. on 40th St.
Unit 3 is a stylishly furnished two-bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with two spacious closets, a TV and kitchen supplies. The 2nd bedroom is currently used as an office and dining room space but the owner is willing to remove the table to fit an additional bed for the new tenants. Other furniture can be supplied based on your needs and availability of supplies. Wifi is included in this rent but electric is the responsibility of the tenant. Free laundry available in the building.
Owner is open to a lease of 3-months or more. First, last and security deposit is required for move-in. Entire apartment available -- this is not for room rental.
More about the location: The building sits at the intersection of the Belmont, Powelton and Mantua neighborhoods and is a 15 minute walk to Drexel's campus, Penn Presbyterian Medical Center, University of Pennsylvania facilities and steps away from public transportation leading into Center City. The building boasts noticeable character seen in intricate carvings found on interior and exterior exposed brick walls and original wood moldings. The building has been fitted with security cameras.

title: Beautiful Bedroom For rent
description: New Construction at its finest! If your looking for a condo unit without the cookie cutter finish but with the characteristics of a home and less density than a large building then this luxury bi-level unit is for you. Upon entering you'll find contemporary custom two toned kitchen cabinets with seamless openings, large kitchen island with farm sink, stainless steel appliance package, quartz countertops, and recessed lighting. The floors are spice oak white solid hardwood floors. There's also two camera monitors at each level with common area door strike opening capability from unit for convenience. The living room has a porcelain entertainment wall with electric fireplace and Bluetooth audio system. As you make your way to the upper level you will appreciate the glass railing which gives a translucent feel to the staircase. There's a wet bar on the second level and large roof top deck with 360 views. There's a large master bedroom suite with porcelain entertainment wall and electric fireplace, Bluetooth speaker audio system, two custom designer closets, designer bathroom with heated flooring, Bluetooth speaker and large shower with wall and ceiling jets. There's a front load washer and dryer located in the laundry room. Another bedroom and a full common area bathroom. Front common entry door comes with key fobs and facial recognition for keyless entry. Property is located across from Fairmount Park, golf driving course and Aldi market. 5-7 min to Center City, in walking distance to the Art Museum, Kelly Drive, The Philadelphia Zoo and 3-5 minutes to 76. Condo unit also comes with full 10 year tax abatement. Annual tax will be determined by office of property assessment! Condo fee to be updated. SELLER OFFERING RATE BUY DOWN!!!
